name: Hayden Schokman Prototypes
description:
Challenge 1 Quick Seasons: click the arrow key that is in the same direction as the image that the center icon represents.

Challenge 2 Grav Hold:  no  challenges or goals just have fun clicking on object and seeing them fly!.

Challenge 3 Verses Speed Maze:   two players race through the maze to the green end.  Player one controls WASD. Player two controls Arrow keys.

Challenge 4 GravMaze:  tilt the phone in the direction you what the ball to roll aim for the center of the maze.
